content.text: Match ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 4, Sevilla 2.
Second Half ends, Borussia Mönchengladbach 4, Sevilla 2.
Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 4, Sevilla 2. Éver Banega (Sevilla) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Granit Xhaka (Borussia Mönchengladbach) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Sevilla. Grzegorz Krychowiak draws a foul in the penalty area.
Yevhen Konoplyanka (Sevilla) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Julian Korb (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Nico Elvedi replaces Fabian Johnson.
Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Lars Stindl.
Attempt missed. Fernando Llorente (Sevilla) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Steven N'Zonzi with a cross.
Josip Drmic (Borussia Mönchengladbach) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Josip Drmic (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Sevilla) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 4, Sevilla 1. Lars Stindl (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Fabian Johnson.
Substitution, Sevilla. Mariano replaces Coke.
Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 3, Sevilla 1. Vitolo (Sevilla) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Fernando Llorente with a through ball.
Offside, Sevilla. Yevhen Konoplyanka tries a through ball, but Benoît Trémoulinas is caught offside.
Foul by Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Sevilla) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Marvin Schulz replaces Mahmoud Dahoud.
Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 3, Sevilla 0. Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lars Stindl with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Fernando Llorente (Sevilla) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Coke with a cross.
Substitution, Sevilla. Fernando Llorente replaces Kevin Gameiro.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Sevilla) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach).

Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Julian Korb.
Goal!  Borussia Mönchengladbach 2, Sevilla 0. Fabian Johnson (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Julian Korb.
Attempt missed. Kevin Gameiro (Sevilla) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Yevhen Konoplyanka.
Substitution, Sevilla. Steven N'Zonzi replaces Michael Krohn-Dehli.
